page.title: 18Living in Bourne End
page.content: {THE VILLAGE } The village is small and consists mainly of houses on the main A.41 road and up Bourne End Lane culminating in a small industrial area.There are two pubs,a cafe and hotel on the main road and another pub by the canal.There are no shops,schools,health facilities etc {A YOUNG MOTHER} This lady has two young children under school age.She is very concerned that there is no local primary school because children either have to be taken by car or walk down a narrow busy lane. There is nowhere for the children to play.They can be taken for walks along the canal but this is a dangerous area for youngsters. It is difficult to walk along the A.41 with lorries thundering past.She looks forward to the by pass being built.
